subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Monta Ellis, Golden State’s emerging second-year guard, moved from basket to basket shooting free throws during a break in practice when Chris Mullin came by to offer a handshake and some kind words.
snippet: Monta Ellis, Golden State’s emerging second-year guard, moved from basket to basket shooting free throws during a break in practice when Chris Mullin came by to offer a handshake and some kind words.
